mobs.long_desc: A speckled rabbit hops around here.
mobs.desc: &0This little rabbit is barely a foot across, its long ears almost as large as its whole body length. Covered with white and black blotches, the rabbit's pelt would probably fetch a few silver in an open market. Its brown eyes peer from side to side, with an intelligence not expected in an animal.&0

mobs.long_desc: A brown rat scurries from shadow to shadow.
mobs.desc: &0This rat is well over a foot long, though quite small when compared to the sewer rats that dwell within the cities. It is armed with beady eyes and yellowed fangs, each used to deter attackers from advancing. A long hairless tail stretches long behind the rat, easily as long as its full body length. Though not dangerous by itself, a swarm of these could overwhelm mosy humans.

mobs.long_desc: A black bat is here, fluttering through the sky.
mobs.desc: &0&9&bBlack as midnight, this massive fruit bat appears as a blotch against the sky. Its wingspan is quite impressive, dwarfing most of the other bat species at four feet across. Though rumored to manuver by sonar, this fruit relies on excellent vision and scent to steer.&0

mobs.long_desc: &0A &0&3wild horse&0 stands here, its powerful form rippling with speed.
mobs.desc: &0&3This wild horse stands here, with a look of nobility and rebellion in its eyes. Its soft brown mane and tail whips in the wind, and although not cared for by human hands, it appears to be free flowing and clear from debris. A white mark runs across the horse's face, marring the otherwise solid brown hide. The horse seems capible of great feats of speed, even when bearing a rider and their gear.&0

mobs.long_desc: A vicious badger is here, glaring at all who approach.
mobs.desc: &0Though much smaller then many of the most dangerous of animals, this little creature can take down a buffalo by itself. When in danger, it is rumored to go into a sort of rage, tearing apart anyone foolish enough to approach. Its hard to believe however, given its cute and cuddly appearance.

mobs.long_desc: A lone timber wolf stands here, its haunting eyes taking in the scene.
mobs.desc: &0It is quite rare to find one of these magnificent beasts alone, since they usually travel and hunt in packs of five or more. Its soft brown and white fur creates a warm coat to fight off the winter chill, and insulate it body from heat during the summer. Though not as dangerous as some animals, its canines and fighting ability make this wolf a dangerous opponent.&0

mobs.long_desc: A sleek panther prowls around, hunting for food.
mobs.desc: &0This panther is a bit smaller then most lions, though it makes up for this fact with better agility and unparraled stealth. Its ebony fur helps hide it in even the shallowest of shadows, allowing the cat to sneak up on prey and pounce before their target even knows whats happening. Few can out hunt this animal, and even fewer can survive against its flashing claws and sharp teeth.&0

mobs.long_desc: A massive polar bear stands here on all fours.
mobs.desc: &0&7&bStanding well over seven feet tall when on its hind legs, this massive polar bears is perhaps the most dangerous of the bear family. Its huge bulky frame, and sharp claws combine to create a impressive fighting machine. Though not as vicious as some of its cousins, the polar bear can hold its own against anything in the tundra, including the freezing temperatures.&0

mobs.long_desc: A slender cheetah stands here, looking for its next meal.
mobs.desc: One of the fastest land animals, this cheetah was built for speed. Slender and light, the cat's whole frame was designed to maximize its running ability. Black spots marr its golden hide, creating a pattern perfect for blending in with the grasslands, its normal hunting grounds. A mane of sorts runs down its back, though not nearly as pronounced as the ones found on lions.

mobs.long_desc: A rhino stands here, its dark eyes gleaming with hidden intelligence.
mobs.desc: &0This massive beast is covered with a dark gray hide, thick enough to deflect swords and arrows alike. Armed with a scimitar-like horn on its snout, the rhino seems ready for combat. It stands well over five feet tall, from its shoulder to the ground, and must weigh more then two or three horses combined. Hunted for the ivory of its horn, this beast is more then willing to gut anyone foolish enough to attack.&0

mobs.long_desc: A brown sparrow flutters through the air.
mobs.desc: &0&3This simple bird is covered with brown feathers, giving it an unremarkable and simple appearance. It is barely the size of a human's hand, much to small to pose a threat to anyone.&0

mobs.long_desc: A bluebird flies around and around.
mobs.desc: &0Deep blue plummage covers this bird, creating an elegant pattern across its stomache and back. Just a bit bigger then a human's hand, this bird is good for very little, except perhaps to admire and observe.&0

mobs.long_desc: A proud robin shows off its crimson chest.
mobs.desc: This small bird is one of the most common throughout the lands, mainly due to the fact that it provides nothing worth taking. Its feathers are of blackish brown, excpet for its chest which is a bright crimson. It seems to fly without a worry through the sky, knowing that most wouldn;t bother to harm it.

mobs.long_desc: A plump owl circles the air, looking for food.
mobs.desc: &0Thick ebony feathers cover this owl, providing adding stealth when hunting in the dead of night. None can move as silently as this plump owl, allowing it to plumpet down upon helpless prey without a sound. It is impossible to surprise due to its head, which can swivel in an almost complete circle.&0

mobs.long_desc: An ebony raven is here, its dark form flying above in the air.
mobs.desc: &0&9&bThis breed of vicious bird is rumored to have connections with witches and warlocks, working as their familiars when in need. Its dark beady eyes only support this theory, as they seem to gleam with some hidden intelligence. In any case, the raven is more dangerous then most of its relatives, due to its larger size.&0

mobs.long_desc: A timberland hawk flies overhead.
mobs.desc: &0This variety of small hawk usually nests in thick wooded areas, high within the canopy of trees. Its small form is adapt at diving through thick layers of branches to get at its prey which scurries about the forest's floor. Though not quite as large as other hawks, this variety can be just as deadly.&0

mobs.long_desc: A seaside falcon hovers through the air, hunting its prey.
mobs.desc: &0Most commonly found along the shores of large lakes and oceans, this falcon is adapt at hunting fish and smaller birds. Its feathers are a mixture of white, gray, and black, creating an interesting yet rather drab pattern. Much larger then a raven, this bird must have a wingspan of at least three and a half feet across.&0

mobs.long_desc: A crimson headed buzzard squawks in a shrill voice.
mobs.desc: &0Perhaps the darkest of birds, this buzzard is normally associated with death and carrion. It feeds off the remains of those recently dead, a habit that gives this bird a bad reputation. It is covered with thick black feathers except for its crimson head, which is bald. Its beak and claws make good tools for ripping flesh from corpses, as well as defending itself from attackers. Quite large for a bird, this creature is sometimes known as a harbringer of death.&0

mobs.long_desc: A golden eagle flies proudly through the air.
mobs.desc: &0&3&bThis massive bird is covered with golden feathers, creating a vision of rightousness that the several elven species hold dear. Perhaps the most virtues of birds, it is said that the golden eagle has in the past aided the elven nation in several wars, alongside their larger giant eagle brethren. Much smaller then their cousins, this eagle is still capable of dealing out a lot of damage with its hooked beak and talons.&0

mobs.long_desc: A flightless ostrich stands here, its bulging eyes glancing around.
mobs.desc: &0Not only is this bird ugly, it lacks the ability to fly. Its stunted wings are not nearly powerful enough to pick its massive body weight from the ground. What it lacks in flying ability, it makes up with sheer speed and physical strength. The kicking power of the ostrich is quite impressive, keeping most predators far at bay.&0

mobs.long_desc: A harmless garter snake slithers along the ground.
mobs.desc: &0This foot long snake is a dark black in coloring, with two pale yellow stripes that run about along its back. It feeds on small insects, and is quite harmless.

mobs.long_desc: A desert lizard stands here, completely motionless.
mobs.desc: &0This lizard is most commonly found out in the desert. It is quite small, barely a foot across. because of this, it hides deep within the sand dunes most of the time, to avoid both the heat and the detection of prowling hunters. Its rough hide is a golden brown, helping it hide in the desert dands.&0

mobs.long_desc: A chameleon stands here, slowly blending into the surrounding color.
mobs.desc: This lizard is capible of shifting into different color schemes, from greens to browns. It slowly takes on the color of the surrounding background, helping it to keep hidden from hunters and other dangers. It is quite small, feeding only upon the tiniest of insects.&0

mobs.long_desc: A crimson asp slithers along the ground, hissing quietly.
mobs.desc: &0This variety of snake is rather small, just above two feet long. Packed into this small package is a dangerous creature however. Its crimson coloring gives warning to all that come near, like a natural sign warning of danger. The crimson asp's bite can deliver a deadly poison, which causes even the bravest of predators to keep their distance.&0

mobs.long_desc: A massive land tortoise moves slowly around.
mobs.desc: Amoung the slowest of land animals, the tortoise moves with deliberate but unhurried steps towards it goal. Its massive size deters attackers, though its hardened outer shell does more for protection. A dull gray in color, the tortoise is rather drab in appearance. Its horned shell covers all of its back, leaving only a thick head and stout legs visisble.

mobs.long_desc: A hooded spitting cobra is here, curled up and ready to strike.
mobs.desc: &0This dangerous serpent is about three and a half feet long, and quite slender for its size. It is a dark black in color, though several crimson and golden markings dot its back and flappy hood. This hood expands when the cobra feels threatened, creating a circular flap of skin to puff out around its head. This species of cobra is capable of spitting its venom, to blind and even paralyze its victims.

mobs.long_desc: A massive sea turtle is here, slowly moving along.
mobs.desc: Though even slower then a tortoise, this variety of turtle is capible of sea travel. Instead of feet it has flippers, allowing it to swim through the water at great speads without trouble. Its massive shell is even more spiked then that of the tortoise, creating a rough surface to deter attacks. Its only weapon is a hooked beak, capable of snapping oyster shells in half.&0

mobs.long_desc: A venomous water viper slithers around.
mobs.desc: This sapphire colored snake is almost five feet long, and is usually found within deep lakes and seas. It is known to be quite venomous, and for this reason most individuals avoid them at all costs. Their serpent like body is thick, making them a bit slower and less agile then most snakes.

mobs.long_desc: A crocodile is here, stretching over ten feet in length.
mobs.desc: &0This ten foot reptile is usually found in swamps and marshes, hunting any whoe fall within their watery lair. Its thick snout is lined with rows of inch long teeth, each sharp enough to pierce armor. Once trapped within this crocodiles massive jaws, few escape.&0

mobs.long_desc: A gigantic anaconda is here, slithering along the ground.
mobs.desc: &0This gigantic anaconda is well over fifteen feet long, and perhaps a foot and a half thick in some places. It is amoung the largest serpents known, capable of taking down an ogre with little difficulty. The bane of even alligators, this massive snake can crush the bones of most victims within seconds, causing internal organs to explode in a violent death. Few are foolish enough to attack such a beast, and even fewer have survived such an attempt.

mobs.long_desc: A little sharp-toothed piranah swims around here.
mobs.desc: It looks unfinished.

mobs.long_desc: A long, dark eel snakes through the water beneath you.
mobs.desc: It looks unfinished.

mobs.long_desc: A sleek swordfish pierces the water ahead of it with its long bill.
mobs.desc: It looks unfinished.

mobs.long_desc: A wide, flat stingray swims through here on dark wings.
mobs.desc: It looks unfinished.

mobs.long_desc: A mottled gray manatee floats here peacefully, eyeing you.
mobs.desc: It looks unfinished.

mobs.long_desc: A long, shady shape moves slowly beneath you.
mobs.desc: It looks unfinished.

mobs.long_desc: A friendly-looking dolphin dances through the water here.
mobs.desc: It looks unfinished.

mobs.long_desc: A sleek whitish shark jets through the water, hunting for prey.
mobs.desc: It looks unfinished.

mobs.long_desc: A huge black killer whale rides the currents here, looking for lunch.
mobs.desc: It looks unfinished.

objects.ground: &0&3A heavy leather backpack lies here.&0

extras.text: This backpack is able to contain a large selection of goods, but its bulky size makes it quite heavy. It is crafted from a fine waterproof leather, and seems capable of resisting most adverse weather conditions.

objects.ground: A sack made of rough cloth is set here.

extras.text: It's a simple sack made from a thick white cloth, smaller than a backpack, but also much lighter.

objects.ground: A bundle of &1crimson cloth&0 lies here.

extras.text: This long robe is crafted from a deep blood red crimson.  It comes with a matching sash, used to tighten it about the waist.  Not very effective in combat, but better then nothing.

objects.ground: &0&9&bA pile of ebony cloth lies here.&0

extras.text: This deep hood increases the wearer's ability to stay hidden within shadows. Its design is similiar to the those worn by cultists and necromancers.

objects.ground: &0&3A heavy brass lantern sits here.&0

extras.text: &)A very plain brass lantern.  It holds about fifteen hours worth of fuel.

objects.ground: A slender wooden torch lies here.

extras.text: &0A simply designed torch, consiting of a burning rag and long slender wooden pole.  Looks like it could last for eight hours or so.

objects.ground: A well-crafted leather waterskin lies here.

extras.text: &0&3A simple leather waterskin of high quality.  &0

objects.ground: A heavy wooden barrel lies here.

extras.text: &0A heavy barrel crafted from hardened wood.  It has been waterproofed to hold liquid effectivly.  Its bulky size can cause problems, but it also allows the barrel to hold a greater amount of supplies.

objects.ground: A simple iron ration lies here.

extras.text: A simple meal of stale bread, cheese, and salted meat stored within a package made of iron. Thus the food is protcted from water, and other predators.

objects.ground: &0&3A heavy wooden raft sits here.&0

extras.text: A simple raft, consisting of several wooden logs bound together with thick rope. It seems large enough to support one individual.

objects.ground: A crude wooden club lies here.

extras.text: A primative club made from a heavy wood. It is unwieldy, but capable of inflicting more damage then a normal blade. Only a rather strong individual could wield this club effectivly.

objects.ground: A crude mace lies here.

extras.text: &0The head of this mace is forged from steel. A perfect ball, marred with only the scars of combat. It is attatched to a stout wooden rod, creating a weapon favored by most clerics.

objects.ground: A dagger with a thin blade lies here.

extras.text: A steel bladed dagger, with a plain wooden hilt.  Its blade has been forged much more thin than usual, creating a weapon adapt at bypassing heavy plate armor.

objects.ground: A crude greatsword lies here.

extras.text: &0A six foot blade, crafted from heavy iron.  Its long hilt is designed for two handed use.  Its crafted of average quality metal, and seems durable enough to last several years of use.  &0

objects.ground: A crude iron longsword lies here.

extras.text: A three foot long blade, forged from cold iron.  Its wooden hilt has been wrapped in thick leather, used to cushion the wielder's hand.  The sword is well-balanced, effective if used by a skilled warrior.

objects.ground: A crude oak staff lies here

extras.text: This staff is about three and a half feet long.  It is designed for wielding with one hand, and is usually employed by mage's for its light weight.  The wood used to craft it is of fine quality, though it remained unpolished.

objects.ground: A crude wooden shield lies here.

extras.text: &0This simple wooden shield has been designed with cost in mind.  It consists of a circular face, with two steel straps upon its back to use as grips. Light, yet not very effective.

objects.ground: A crude shortsword lies here.

extras.text: This crude sword is rather small to be called a sword, but it's definitely bigger than a dagger.  It's rather simple in design and shoddily made.

objects.ground: A crude leather jacket lies here.

extras.text: Poor quality leather was used to craft this jacket.  Its thick hide has been studded with metal knobs, to better deflect attacks.  It offers a small amount of protection even for the extra weight.

objects.ground: Some crude leather pants lie here.

extras.text: Crafted of a crude leather, and studded with metal knobs for added protection against physical attacks.  They are a bit heavy, and far too encumbering for a sorcerer to wear.

objects.ground: A pair of cloth &1crimson leggings&0 lie here, neatly folded

extras.text: A pair of loose fitting pants.  They are crafted of light cloth, offering little protection against physical attacks or the weather.

objects.ground: A pair of crude studded leather gauntlets lie here.

extras.text: &0A pair of hardened leather gauntlets.  The knuckles have been studded with metal knobs, providing extra protection against attack.

objects.ground: A pile of cloth and hide lies here glowing.

extras.text: These sleeves are remarkably light and offer a sense of protection unseen. There is hide padding on the elbows to provide a little extra protection.

objects.ground: A pair of soft &5purple&0 leather gloves lies here.

extras.text: These gloves are sewn from a soft leather and dyed a rich purple.

objects.ground: A studded leather helmet lies here.

extras.text: &0A simple helmet, designed to cover most of the head.  It leaves the face open, allowing the user a wide viewing arc.  It is crafted from a thick leather, and studded with inch long spikes to add further protection against attacks.

objects.ground: &0A &0&3leather&0 skullcap&0 lies here.

extras.text: &0A small cap, crafted from thick leather.  It fits over the top area of the head, protecting it from glancing blows.  Most often employed by mages who do not wish to be encumbered by larger helmets.

objects.ground: Some crude leather boots sit here.

extras.text: A pair of tall leather boots.  They reach about half way to the knee, providing protection against shallow puddles of water and mud.  Crafted from thick crude leather, these boots were designed to deflect attacks during combat.

objects.ground: Some plain sandals sit here.

extras.text: &0A pair of simple sandals, woven from fine leather.  They are padded to provide comfort during long travels, though they offer no protection from hostile weather.

objects.ground: A &2green&0 woolen cloak is draped here.

extras.text: A thick cloak crafted from a green cloth.  It is quite long, sweeping down almost four feet in length.  Its coloring blends in well with a forest background, offering a bit of camoflauge.

objects.ground: &0A &0&3spellbook&0 lies here.

extras.text: Bound with a leather cover, this spellbook has about a hundred high-quality pages.  A studious mage could write his or her own spells in this book using the 'scribe' command and a quill at his or her guildmaster.

objects.ground: A white feather quill lies here.

extras.text: &0A slender quill made from a white feather.  Its point is used to dunk in ink and write with.

objects.ground: A braided leather belt lies here.

extras.text: &0A thick belt, crafted from brown leather.  It is adorned with a simple bronze buckle, which shines like new.  Several notches run along the belt's length, allowing it to be adjusted for a wide assortment of sizes.

objects.ground: A wide bronze ring lies here.

extras.text: &0A cheap little ring, forged from bronze.  It lacks any design, resembling a simple band of metal.  &0

objects.ground: A crude metal bracelet sits here.

extras.text: This simple bracelet is crafted from inexpensive metals.  For such a simple bangle it provides a small bit of protection and decoration.

objects.ground: A glass bottle sits here.

extras.text: &0A slender bottle of clear glass. It is labeled as wine. A rather cheap and sour tasting vintage.

objects.ground: &0A small &0&3wooden&0 keg sits here.

extras.text: &0A heavy wooden keg, capable of carrying a bit less then a barrel. It is marked with the word ALE on one side.

objects.ground: A simple wooden mask lies here.

extras.text: &0This small mask is crafted of a dark wood, and is designed to slip easily over the face.  It has very littlte detail, save for a small etched mouth and two slits for eyes.  Quite uncomfortable, and not very stylish.

objects.ground: A tin earring lies here.

extras.text: &0This earring is crafted from tin.  It is shaped like a small hoop, barely half an inch in length.

objects.ground: &0A &0&2&blight green&0 scarf lies here.

extras.text: This scarf is crafted from a flowing light green material.  It is very light, though offers only minimal protection from physical attacks.

objects.ground: A leather bracer lies here.

extras.text: &0A simple leather bracer, about two feet in length.  It offers protection to the lower arm, with its padded surface.

objects.ground: &0&3An odd breastplate lies here.&0

extras.text: &0This odd looking breastplate appears to be crafted from a piece of solid wood, chiseled and sanded with a powerful magic to perfection.  Glowing vines weave themselves around the wooden breastplate, adding their steel-like endurance to its powerful frame.  &0

objects.ground: &0&3A pair of odd armplates lie here.&0

extras.text: &0A set of wooden armplates, each carved from a single piece of gleaming wood. Wild vines grow in and around the joints, their mystical lengths pulsating w with some hidden life.

objects.ground: &0&3A pair of odd legplates lie here.&0

extras.text: &0A pair of oddly carved legplates, designed to cover the upper and lower leg as well as the knee with a seperate plate.  Vibrant green vines hold the armor together, keeping it securly in place while enforcing it with a mystical force.

objects.ground: &1A blade of dancing flames lies here.&0

extras.text: &0&1This blade is forged of blazing flames, held together by the magic of a skilled pyromancer. They dance about, sending stinging tendrils along its length and towards whoever dares to stand against its wielder. No smoke comes from the magical fire, but the heat is quite potent.&0

objects.ground: A bronze helm lies here, forgotten.

extras.text: It is made of bronze bands overlapping a thick leather base.  It covers most of the head, and has a noseguard to protect the face.

objects.ground: A fine &7&bwhite lace wedding veil&0 has been set here.

extras.text: Lace is so finely crocheted from white silk thread that it seems like this veil is made of spiderwebs.  It covers the head, but does not obscure the features in any way, instead ghosting an image of its wearer.

objects.ground: A pair of &7&bwhite satin&0 slippers stands here.

extras.text: They are made of heavy satin, and are padded to make wearing them comfortable. The soles are sturdy brown leather.

objects.ground: &4A dagger of jagged ice lies here, melting...&0

extras.text: &4Forged from chilling ice, this dagger is held together by the magic of a skilled cryomancer.  The ice glistens in the light, droplets of water melting off the dagger and refreezing sharper than before.  &0

objects.ground: A Color Quick-Reference Strip lies here.

objects.short: the ansi color book of fiery yay
objects.ground: A book describing ansi color lies here unattended.

extras.text: 1    - &1Red&0          1 b - &1&bBright Red&0 2    - &2Green&0        2 b - &2&bBright Green&0 3    - &3Brown&0        3 b - &3&bYellow&0 4    - &4Blue&0         4 b - &4&bBright Blue&0 5    - &5Purple&0       5 b - &5&bBright Purple&0 6    - &6Teal&0         6 b - &6&bBright Teal&0 7    - &7White&0        7 b - &7&bBright White&0 8    - &8underline&0    &&b  -&bbright&0 9    - &9Black&0        9 b - &9&bBright Black&0 Remember to put &&0 at the end of each line to clear the ANSI strings!

triggers.name: armor of gaia destroy self remove
triggers.commands: wait 2 oecho %self.name% crumbles to dust and blows away. opurge %self%
